alert.note: Alert for Northern Berrien (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 19 at 8:41PM EST until January 20 at 1:00PM EST by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 PM EST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Heavy lake effect snow. Additional snow accumulations of 2 to 6 inches. Snowfall rates of 1 to 2 inches per hour expected with the heavier lake effect snow bands. Near whiteout conditions with less than one quarter of a mile visibility at times with the heavier snow bands. * WHERE...In Indiana, Eastern St. Joseph IN County. In Michigan, Northern Berrien County. The heaviest additional snow accumulations are expected across Berrien County. * WHEN...Until 1 PM EST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Moderate to heavy lake effect snow will continue this evening. A lull in the heavier lake effect snow showers is possible overnight tonight into early Saturday. However, additional moderate to heavy lake effect snow showers are expected on Saturday. Due to the nature of lake effect snow, conditions can vary significantly over very short distances, going from just flurries to whiteout conditions over the span of just a few miles. This can also result in highly variable snowfall totals over short distances.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency.
